document_data.name: Imaskari Shield
document_data.mainbody: '''Imaskari Shields''' were [[tower shield]]s enchanted to grant minor spell resistance. They were not created by the [[Artificer (Imaskari)|Imaskari]]; instead, they were used to fight them.{{cite game/Neverwinter Nights}}
document_data.Powers: Imaskari shields carried a minor enchantment of resistance against all magic, unlikely to block even half of the feeblest spells.
